about.title: About us
about.company_mission: Unique knowledge is the future: innovative ideas, new approaches, methods and strategies for project management
about.content: PM Expert is a leader in the field of project management training and certification of managers in Uzbekistan, also provides professional project management services, programs and project portfolios in the following areas: outsourcing (external project management of the customer), consulting (implementation of project management in the customer’s company), training (full-time and remote trainings on project management) and certification (assessment of specialists and audit of project management systems in companies).
about.description: Project management training and certification of specialists in project management at PM Expert

footer.subscribe_text: Subscribe to receive information about the most interesting events, new courses, promotions and discounts.
